original_text: The Lord God took the man and he put him in the Garden of Eden. God wanted the man to work in the garden and to take care of it.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 그 사람을 이끌어 에덴 동산에 두어 그것을 경작하며 지키게 하시고

sentences.original_text: The Lord God took the man
and he put him in the Garden of Eden
God wanted the man to work in the garden
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 사람이 동산에서 일하기를 원하셨다

sentences.original_text: and to take care of it
